sentence: Kentucky and Ohio governors Andy Beshear and Mike DeWine are asking for up to $2 billion in federal funding for the Brent Spence Bridge Corridor Project.

title: Beshear, DeWine seek $2 billion for Brent Spence Bridge companion project

sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine signed a bill that eliminates a concealed carry permit requirement for Ohioans ages 21 and over who are legally eligible to own and carry a firearm in the state.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: Ohio Becomes Latest State to Allow Concealed Gun Carry Without a Permit

title: What to know about Ohio's new permitless concealed carry law
